But it also wasn’t robbers it was escaped convicts.[/quote]

item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“BloodRayne, post:3, topic:424562”]I am Archer leader of the gorgonites

Awesome movie movie :D[/quote]
I FUCKING LOVED SMALL SOLDIERS!

Home Alone 3, although it doesn’t do the home alone series any justice, had a kid who beats up robbers and uses an RC car. I used to like it when I was younger but it’s cringe worthy now

thats one expensive RC! anyone ever seen that movie about the kid that has all these remote control cars and planes and he beats up some robbers with them. it was definantly a b film but one of my favorites as a kid.

I am Archer leader of the gorgonites

Awesome movie movie

Edit: Actually I think you’re talking about a different movie. but that’s a good movie too ^

BBC News

Iran displays captured US drone

Iranian TV shows the first video footage of an advanced unmanned US drone aircraft that Tehran says it downed near the Afghan border.

Discuss.
